modShortDescription: Same as Better Attributes: Fortitude - just this time for stamina. But with some nice additions too: Crouch, walk and run up to 50% faster.
modDescription:
Same as [Better Attributes: Fortitude](https://7daystodiemods.com/better-attributes-fortitude/) – just this time for stamina. But with some nice additions too: Crouch, walk and run up to 50% faster, leveling this attribute!

Compatibility: A18+

[**Download**](https://www.mediafire.com/file/wh4jizsvd9mniks/Claymore_Better_Attributes_Agility.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
